name: @snowytime/xanax
description: A simple, lightweight, and fast nodejs xml parser/builder

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types && sh finalize.sh
scripts.release:patch: npm run test && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m '⚡️ auto patch' && git push origin master && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run test && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m '⚡️ auto minor' && git push origin master && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run test && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m '⚡️ auto major' && git push origin master && npm version major && npm publish

author: snowytime
